alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 11:11AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Essex County through 1145 AM EDT... At 1110 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keene, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Keene, Keene Valley, Lewis, Upper Jay, Deerhead, North Jay, New Russia, and Wadhams. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 113 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
